column4: Hey all. A quick one - my displayport is not working in precise, but does on fedora 17. I suppose it's xorg 1.12 that I need, and tried to install it from x swat lts backports repo. The problem is I don't know how - if I try to install xorg-server-lts-backports it tries to uninstall all of the desktop components I have (kde). Any way I can install it without affecting the rest? BTW, not running pure precise, but rather mint KDE.
I know that Think, was just looking for "official" ubuntu procedure to install those packages.
if you aren't running ubuntu expect things to go bad
those pages are written with ubuntu in mind
